description: Transform Easter eggs into a rich chocolate brownie pie. This Easter dessert topped with fresh berries, ice-cream and caramel sauce is sure to hit the spot.
name: Easter Brownie Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 75g Woolworths solid milk chocolate Easter eggs

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Lightly grease a 25cm round (top measurement) non-stick ovenproof frying pan.

Combine brownie mix, butter and eggs in a medium bowl. Fold through half of the chocolate eggs. Pour two-thirds of the mixture into pan. Place dark chocolate in centre of pan, pushing down slightly. Cover with remaining brownie mixture.
Bake for 25 minutes or until pie starts to come away from side of pan. Remove pan from oven and set aside for 5 minutes.
Serve pie warm topped with caramel, remaining chocolate eggs, ice-cream and raspberries.
